name: Magistus Invocation
text: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as Fusion Material, including a Spellcaster monster. If Summoning a "Magistus" Fusion Monster this way, you can also use monsters in your Spell & Trap Zone that are equipped to a "Magistus" monster as Fusion Material. You can only activate 1 "Magistus Invocation" per turn.
